title: Ex-IGN host Sydnee Goodman reunites with current IGN host Jeffrey Vega. #fallout #tv #streaming

description: During the investigations of a drug trafficking app, the Monster Cop Ma Seok-do (Don Lee) and his team discover a connection between the wanted app developer, who was killed in the Philippines, and a massive illegal online gambling organization. Meanwhile, in the Philippines, Baek Chang-gi, a former elite soldier, has been controlling the Korean online illegal gambling market, terrorizing it with kidnap, assault, and murder. His partner, the IT genius CEO, Chang Dong-chul plans an even larger scheme in Korea. To put an end to the escalating threat, Detective Ma expands the operation by proposing an unexpected alliance to Jang, and unfolds the biggest roundup mission to hunt down the criminals, collaborating with the cyber unit and Metro Investigations.
title: The Roundup: Punishment - Official Trailer (2024) Don Lee, Kim Moo-yul

description:
The Adventure Continues...
Toei Animation celebrates the 25th anniversary of Digimon Animation with this special commemorative video! Delivering the OP songs of the first four TV anime works in a new arrangement medley! (“Butter-Fly” “Target ~ Red Shock” “The Biggest Dreamer” “FIRE!!”)

#IGN #Digimon #DigimonAnimation25th
title: Digimon Animation - Official 25th Anniversary Special Trailer

description:
The Fallout show premieres tonight and you can catch up on the lore by playing your way through every single Fallout game with the Fallout S.P.E.C.I.A.L. edition. Plus Target's big Circle deals event is live and kind of rules, and you can preorder Star Wars: Outlaws right now.

Fallout S.P.E.C.I.A.L. edition: https://zdcs.link/MjxW0
Dream Vapor Xbox controller deal at Target: https://zdcs.link/dPgx6
Preorder Star Wars Outlaws: https://zdcs.link/gPVw0
title: Play Every Fallout Game Ever for Just $59.99

description:
Opera GX is an alternative browser offering a more custom internet experience. Take a look at the new Cyberpunk 2077 Browser Mod available for Opera GX users bringing a live wallpaper featuring V in Night City, custom themes that can sync up PC RGB lighting, background music, shaders, and more. The Cyberpunk 2077 Browser Mod for Opera GX is available now.

#IGN #Gaming #Cyberpunk2077
title: Opera GX - Official Cyberpunk 2077 Browser Mod Trailer

description:
Godzilla x Kong: Titan Chasers is a free-to-play mobile 4X strategy game developed by Hunted Cow Studios. Players will embody elite explorers known as Titan Chasers to witness massive monsters and titans, while skillfully enhancing their elite team's capabilities and resources amongst other players on the island. Embark on thrilling expeditions and test the mettle of their squads in strategic, turn-based RPG combat to uncover the dark secrets of the Sirens in the main story campaign or fight as their favorite Superspecies in the monster vs monster campaign. Witness the fury of Godzilla and Kong, and join the fight against colossal predators. Godzilla x Kong: Titan Chasers is available for preorder now on iOS and Android.

#Gaming #Godzilla #IGN
title: Godzilla x Kong: Titan Chasers - Official Gameplay Trailer

description:
Check out the teaser trailer for Palworld as the Pal Arena heads to Palworld in 2024. Battle against other players, pitting both yourself and your pals against them. Train the strongest Pals and defeat all your rivals! Palworld is an open-world survival crafting monster-collecting game that supports up to 32 players and is set in a world where mysterious creatures called "Pals" live. Along your adventures, you will encounter many Pals. Capture them, make them work, fight, breed and even sell them. You can adventure in a large world alongside your Pals.

#IGN
title: Palworld - Official Arena Teaser Trailer | Triple-I Initiative Showcase

description:
Risk of Rain 2's Devotion update brings the new Verdant Falls stage, new Devotion artifact, new Delusion artifact, and The Prisoner from Dead Cells as an alt skin. Check out the latest Risk of Rain 2 trailer to see what to expect with this Devotion update, coming soon. Escape a chaotic alien planet by fighting through hordes of frenzied monsters – with your friends, or on your own. Combine loot in surprising ways and master each character until you become the havoc you feared upon your first crash landing.

#IGN
title: Risk of Rain 2 - Official Devotion Update (ft. Dead Cells Skin & More) Trailer

description:
Watch the latest trailer for Hyper Light Breaker to see action-packed gameplay featuring combat against a mini-boss from this upcoming co-op rogue-lite adventure set in the Hyper Light universe. Hyper Light Breaker will launch in Steam Early Access in summer 2024. 

Hyper Light Breaker is a follow-up to the first Hyper Light game, Hyper Light Drifter. Set decades prior to Drifter, in this new adventure, you are a Breaker, a mercenary tasked with entering the Overgrowth, a world in disarray within the Hyper Light universe. Either solo or with up to two fellow Breakers, players will explore large procedurally-generated biomes in a vibrant open world, encounter brutal monsters, create new character builds, fight against mysterious bosses known as Crowns, and overthrow the ominous Abyss King.

#IGN
title: Hyper Light Breaker - Official Mini-Boss Reveal Trailer | Triple-I Initiative Showcase

description: The iconic roguelike deckbuilder returns. Check out the animated reveal trailer for Slay the Spire 2. Craft a unique deck, encounter bizarre creatures, and discover relics of immense power in Slay the Spire 2, coming to Early Access in 2025.
title: Slay the Spire 2 - Official Reveal Trailer | Triple-I Initiative Showcase

description: Join composer Eric Hillman for a behind-the-scenes look at Flintlock: The Siege of Dawn and deep dive into the music of the upcoming action-RPG souls-lite adventure. Flintlock: The Siege of Dawn will be available on Xbox Series X/S, PlayStation 5, and PC via Steam and the Epic Games Store in Summer 2024, and it will also be available day one with Xbox Game Pass. In Flintlock: The Siege of Dawn, join humanity’s last stand as Gods and guns collide. The Door to the Great Below has been opened, unleashing the Gods and their armies of the Dead. The lands of Kian are besieged; it’s time for the Coalition army to fight back. Embrace vengeance, gunpowder and magic and embark on an epic journey to defeat the Gods, retake the world, and close the Door. Your battle begins now.
title: Flintlock: The Siege of Dawn - Official Composing Vengeance Trailer | Triple-I Initiative Showcase

description:
Watch the new Mouse gameplay trailer for the upcoming noir-fueled FPS inspired by classic 1930s cartoons. In this Mouse teaser we get a brief look at the game's Spike-D spinach powerup in action.
 
Assume the role of a private detective navigating a noir city teeming with unsavoury characters. Unravel a quest for justice in a city mired in chaos, corruption, and vibrant energy, utilizing a diverse arsenal of weapons, power-ups, and explosives to thwart the takeover by corrupt politicians. 

Mouse has a planned release window of 2025 and its available to wishlist on Steam.

#Gaming #IGN #Games
title: Mouse - Official Spike-D Gameplay Teaser Trailer | Triple-I Initiative Showcase

description:
Get a good first look at The Rogue Prince of Persia gameplay for the new 2D action-platforming roguelite game, coming to PC via Steam Early Access on May 14, 2024. Check out 11 minutes of exciting The Rogue Prince of Persia gameplay, featuring the game's early levels, combat and enemies, and a peek at some weapons and upgrades. 

From Ubisoft and partnering studio Evil Empire (the indie studio that worked on Dead Cells' post-launch content), The Rogue Prince of Persia is set in a fictional reimagining of Ctesiphon, the capital of the Persian Empire. The city faces invasion by the Hun's army of possessed soldiers, led by the malevolent Hun chief, Nogai. So, it's up to you to take on the role of the Prince, who is a master in combat and acrobatics, and rally his allies to save the city from destruction. Wall run, shoulder vault, and kick your way through a variety of biomes, discover new trinkets and weapons, and more in each unique run.

#Gaming #PrinceOfPersia #IGN
title: The Rogue Prince of Persia - Official Gameplay | Triple-I Initiative Showcase

description: Hands-on with The Rogue Prince of Persia, the 2D roguelite that takes the Dead Cells formula and wall-runs with it. Previewed by Tristan Ogilvie.
title: The Rogue Prince of Persia Hands-On Preview: Bringing Dead Cells Back to Life?

description:
Check out gameplay from V Rising: Legacy of Castlevania in this latest trailer for the upcoming crossover, which brings vampire hunter Simon Belmont to the open-world fantasy survival game when it fully launches on Steam on May 8, 2024. V Rising is also coming to PS5 at a later date in 2024.

In V Rising, survive as a newly awakened vampire in a world ruled by humans and rise to become the next Dracula. Feed on blood to gain new powers, hide from the scorching sun, and engage in real-time PvE and PvP combat set in a dark fantasy realm. Raise your castle and invite friends to join as you explore a vast open world, pillage villages, skirmish with bandits, and delve into the lairs of supernatural beasts. Attack other players’ castles or become a diplomat in a game of blood, power, and betrayal.

#Gaming #VRising #Castlevania
title: V Rising - Official Legacy of Castlevania Gameplay Trailer | Triple-I Initiative Showcase

description: Here's your first look at RKGK in this reveal trailer for the upcoming anime-inspired single-player 3D platformer game coming to PC via Steam in summer 2024. In RKGK, the rebellious graffiti artist Valah is the only one who can fight back against the oppressive corporation that has taken over her city. Use stylish platforming action, chaotic mayhem, and vibrant self-expression to restore color and life to the citizens of Cap City. Turn heads, drop jaws, and be bright.
title: RKGK - Official Reveal Trailer | Triple-I Initiative Showcase

description:
Watch the latest trailer for Darkest Dungeon 2 for a peek at the Kingdoms game mode which is coming as a free update in 2024 to the roguelike turn-based game. Darkest Dungeon 2 is a roguelike turn-based road trip of the damned. Form a party, equip your stagecoach, and set off across the decaying landscape on a last gasp quest to avert the apocalypse. From the burning Sprawl to the diseased Foetor, the long road to the Mountain will challenge your strategies and your endurance. With careful leadership you can create the party bonds required to withstand the nightmarish onslaught, reach the Mountain and prevail against the monstrous manifestations of your failures.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Darkest Dungeon 2 - Official 'Kingdoms' Game Mode Trailer | Triple-I Initiative Showcase

description:
Learn about the story set up of Cataclismo in this latest trailer for the upcoming real-time strategy and tower defense game from the creators of Moonlighter. The trailer also gives us a look at the world, building elements, and the hordes of enemies you'll be up against. Cataclismo will be available on PC on July 16, 2024. In Cataclismo, defend the last bastion of humanity in a ruined world, building fortresses brick by brick to fend off waves of Horrors. Withstand the siege and rise above the haze in a story of hope, resilience, and community.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Cataclismo - Official Hogar's Hope Trailer | Triple-I Initiative Showcase

description: Meet the Gods, see action-packed gameplay, and see what to expect with Death Must Die: Act II, available on April 20, 2024. Descend the Nether in search of Death himself! Choose from God-given powers to slay his hordes of minions. Unlock new heroes, collect powerful items and create game-breaking synergies in this roguelite hack and slash survivors game.
title: Death Must Die: Act 2 - Official Reveal Trailer | Triple-I Initiative Showcase

description:
Dive into the world of Endzone 2 and see gameplay from this upcoming post-apocalyptic survival colony builder in this latest trailer. Endzone 2 is coming to Early Access in summer 2024. In Endzone 2, you embark to secure humanities survival after a cataclysmic disaster. Discover and repopulate the last habitable grounds, while the survival of your people hinges on your wits, foresight, and resilience in a harsh and unforgiving world.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Endzone 2 - Official Gameplay Trailer | Triple-I Initiative Showcase

description:
Destiny 2 The Final Shape gameplay was just revealed by Bungie and there's a ton of exciting details that they showed. Here's everything we know so far about the upcoming release of Destiny 2: The Final Shape.

#Gaming #Destiny #IGN
title: Everything We Know About Destiny 2: The Final Shape So Far

description:
Zenless Zone Zero is an upcoming free-to-play urban fantasy action role-playing game developed by miHoYo. Players can now head to Zenless Zone Zero's official website or our official social media platforms to sign up for the upcoming technical test for PS5. Take a look at the trailer to see some of the action that's in store for players of Zenless Zone Zero, launching in 2024 for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and PC.

#Gaming #ZenlessZoneZero #IGN
title: Zenless Zone Zero - Official PS5 Technical Test Trailer

description:
Dave the Diver is a singleplayer deep-sea exploration and management adventure RPG developed by MINTROCKET. Take a look at the latest trailer that goes over key features specifically tuned for the PS5 DualSense like adaptive triggers, haptic feedback, and use of the controller speaker to aid players on their deep-sea dives. Dave the Diver is launching on April 16 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), and the PlayStation Plus Game Catalog for PS Plus Extra and Premium tiers.

#Gaming #DaveTheDiver #IGN
title: Dave the Diver - Official PS5 Features Trailer

description:
As the Fallout games are so fond of reminding us, war never changes. No matter the setting – Washington D.C., Boston, Las Vegas – there will always be opportunities for players to wage wastelander-on-wastelander warfare for the future of mankind. And yes, Amazon Prime Video's Fallout TV show seems to be no stranger to war, quietly suggesting conflict between the Brotherhood of Steel and other factions from the larger Fallout universe.

But what about those of us who want our Fallout to lean into the absurdity of the wasteland? Can Fallout still be prestige television if it’s utilizing the weirder elements of the franchise?
While publishers Bethesda Softworks have confirmed that they are treating Prime Video’s series as canon… well, there’s canon, and then there’s “canon.” In each of the games, your choices as a player reshape the wasteland in your own image, and what is canon to someone on a no-kill playthrough may not exactly be canon to someone who prefers to dish out wasteland just
title: Fallout TV Show: 5 Ways It Can Keep the Wasteland Weird

description: Democracy continues to spread across the galaxy thanks to yet more new content dropping in Helldivers 2. Have a seat at the Dive Bar and let us regale you with war stories about what’s new and exciting in the “Democratic Detonation” Warbond, which arrives just in time for the return of those damned Automatons. We run down some of the new ordinance, including the BR-14 Adjudicator Rifle, the R-36 Eruptor Rifle, the CB-9 Exploding Crossbow and the piping hot Thermite Grenade. Plus, if you’ve been derelicting your democratic duty and not helping fight back the bugs and bots, what’s a good low-level loadout for beginners? Fleet Admiral Jada Griffin has some recommended stratagems to help do your part.
title: Helldivers 2’s New Warbond Adds Space Crossbows, Thermite and New Capes

description:
Watch our Fallout review for Season 1 of the Prime Video Fallout TV show! 

Arriving on Prime Video, in collaboration with Bethesda Games, is the Fallout TV series: a bright and funny apocalypse filled with dark punchlines and bursts of ultra-violence, Fallout is among the best video game adaptations ever made.

Fallout Season 1 will be available to stream on Prime Video on April 10, 2024 in the US and April 11 in the UK.

#Fallout #TV #IGN
title: Fallout Season 1 Review
Invincible finale references Spider-man, Batman and Fortnite
How to get the official Fallout hoodie

description:
Watch the teaser trailer for Joker: Folie à Deux, the sequel to 2019's Joker, starring Joaquin Phoenix, and Lady Gaga (Stefani Germanotta). Coming to theaters and IMAX on October 4, 2024

#IGN #Movies #Joker2
title: Joker 2 (Joker: Folie à Deux) - Official Teaser Trailer (2024) Joaquin Phoenix, Lady Gaga
What the eclipse looked like from space

description:
Genosha awaits. Check out this new clip from Marvel Animation's X-Men '97 all-new series. 

Marvel Animation’s X-Men’97 revisits the iconic era of the 1990s as The X-Men, a band of mutants who use their uncanny gifts to protect a world that hates and fears them, are challenged like never before, forced to face a dangerous and unexpected new future. 

The all-new series features 10 episodes. The voice cast includes Ray Chase as Cyclops, Jennifer Hale as Jean Grey, Alison Sealy-Smith as Storm, Cal Dodd as Wolverine, JP Karliak as Morph, Lenore Zann as Rogue, George Buza as Beast, AJ LoCascio as Gambit, Holly Chou as Jubilee, Isaac Robinson-Smith as Bishop, Matthew Waterson as Magneto, and Adrian Hough as Nightcrawler. 

Beau DeMayo serves as head writer; episodes are directed by Jake Castorena, Chase Conley and Emi Yonemura, and the series is executive produced by Brad Winderbaum, Kevin Feige, Louis D’Esposito, Victoria Alonso and DeMayo. Featuring music by the Newton Brothers, Marvel A
title: X-Men '97 - Official 'A Place To Call Home' Clip (2024) Lenore Zann, A.J. LoCascio
